summary:
> LINK · 'QArt Coder' by Russ Cox
A small service allowing you to generate QR codes for a URL and to embed a small picture within the code itself. 
It takes a bit of tinkering to get something you're happy with, and as per the instructions on the site, "small, high contrast images work best".  It's pretty to simple to get something workable in just a few minutes though...
title: > Embed your own images in QR codes

summary:
> LINK · Wiktionary definition for 'balls to the wall'
. but you thought it was something testicular, right. 

First attested in the 1960s in the context of aviation, in reference to ball-shaped grips on an aircraft's engine controls (typically throttle, prop pitch and fuel mixture)...
title: > You have not considered the phrase 'balls to the wall' before
